quote_first: Of course, they had good reason to be fussy on such a night. And then it was long
quote_last: and yet there was no sign of Gabriel and his wife. Besides they were dreadfully afraid that Freddy Malins might turn up screwed.
title: The Dead
author: James Joyce

quote_first:
“Let me know as soon as you hear anything.”
Quoyle shivered in the chilly kitchen. The clock said
quote_last: . He could not hear the sea.
title: The Shipping News
author: Annie Proulx

quote_last: William settled down on his bunk just after ten, but he didn’t sleep. Some of the deckhands were playing cards, while others told unlikely tales of treasure they had recovered from the bottom of the ocean.
title: Nothing Ventured
author: Jeffrey Archer
